entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
